q1.question: How long does the approval process take?
q1.answer: Usually the approval process takes between 15-30 minutes. In most cases you get a response immediately after submitting your application.

q2.question: What documents are required?
q2.answer: Only an ID card and proof of income are required. All documents can be uploaded online.

q3.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q3.answer: No, there are no hidden fees. All costs are clearly stated before signing the contract.

q4.question: Can I repay the loan early?
q4.answer: Yes, you can repay the loan early without additional early repayment fees.
